articles.title: Territory rights bill likely to pass Senate next week, allowing for euthanasia debate in ACT and NT - ABC News
articles.description: The ACT and Northern Territory are a step closer to being able to legislate for voluntary assisted dying after a vote in the Senate today.

articles.title: In praise of beef tongue: It's versatile and delicious, so why don't more people eat it? - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Singapore now has its first gyutan specialty restaurant dedicated to beef tongue. Will it be able to reach beyond those who love offal to those who recoil at the thought of it?
articles.content: Of course, there are people who balk simply at the suggestion of dining on offal. But I suspect these same people will quite happily eat and pay a lot for foie gras, which is goose liver; uni, which … [+880 chars]
